sentences.english: Intraenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允许口服液体补充静脉体液量。

sentences.english: The lymphatic system drains and filters the body’s fluids.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴系统会输送并过滤人体的体液。

sentences.english: Genital HPV is spread through skin-to-skin contact, not through an exchange of bodily fluid.
sentences.chinese: 生殖器HPV是通过皮肤接触传播，不通过体液传播。

sentences.english: Organism disorder in cell and humoral immunity is one of causes resulting in its relapse.
sentences.chinese: 机体细胞及体液免疫紊乱成为易复发的原因之一。

sentences.english: Body fluid which includes blood and Jin-ye is the fluid structure of human being.
sentences.chinese: 体液是人体的流体结构，包括血与津液。

sentences.english: There is a little bit of inherent effect of fluid retention. Not blood pressure per se but with weight gain.
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素治疗通过影响体液储留可也会增加体重。

sentences.english: AIDS is triggered by a virus acquired through direct contact with infected body fluids.
sentences.chinese: 通过与被感染者体液的直接接触就会引发艾滋病。

sentences.english: Immunity to disease is primarily cell-mediated, with humoral immunity playing a minor role.
sentences.chinese: 对该病的免疫主要是细胞免疫，体液免疫作用轻微。

sentences.english: Intravenous fluid repletion allows oral fluids to be offered sparingly.
sentences.chinese: 允许口服液体补充静脉体液量。

sentences.english: His discovery did not abolish the notion of humors, which would continue well into the 19th century.
sentences.chinese: 其发现没有否定体液，它延续至19世纪。

sentences.english: Surfaces contaminated by blood or other body fluids should be cleaned and disinfected .
sentences.chinese: 血液或其他体液污染表面应进行清洁和消毒。

sentences.english: This makes humoral immune antibodies not easy to identify and attack HIV.
sentences.chinese: 这使得体液免疫的抗体不容易识别并攻击HIV。

sentences.english: Indulge in the sexy sweetness of this ultra - luxe body lotion.
sentences.chinese: 超奢华护体液提供性感甜蜜的享受。

sentences.english: Fastidiously, she drinks the liquid tissues of her prey. Then she moves on, to kill again.
sentences.chinese: 它毫不留情的吸取猎物的体液，然后继续杀死它。

sentences.english: Conclusions XAG can enhance the function of mice humoral immunity.
sentences.chinese: 结论心安颗粒可增强正常小鼠体液免疫功能。

sentences.english: Thiocyanate is naturally present in body fluids like blood and saliva.
sentences.chinese: 硫氰酸一般存在于体液中，如血液和唾液。

definition: within the body/in vivo (vs in vitro)/internal to
